edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class ImportPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.ImportPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ImportPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

GUI element that houses all the components needed to import a set of files into a Biblio library. It has a set of FileImportCells laid out in a grid pattern in a JScrollPane.

See Also:
Serialized Form
